skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in Araby, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: These noble beasts absorb the sun's heat, transmuting it into the burning light that flows over their skin like ripples of brightest flame.

effects.description: Mount: Radiant Pegasus
Ability: "Radiant Discharge"

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Elephants are unstoppable beasts. Trained on the battlefield, they lead Araby's leaders to war, wiping out everything that gets in their way.

effects.description: Mount: Royal War Elephant

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can pass through trees.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.

skillTree.localised_description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

effects.description: Casualties captured post-battle: +5%
Casualties captured post-battle: +12%
Casualties captured post-battle: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Even from within their vessels the Djinn will protect their masters.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the elemental spirits, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: The Sultan demands conquest and we will give him nothing else.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mehmed favors using his light cavalry to weaken the enemy and then smashes them with his cataphracts.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The sun-blackened Dervishers march under the Black Lizard.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Dervishers units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Dervishers units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Not only is his brutality frightening, but also his deadly skill in close combat.

effects.description: Hit points: +8%
Charge bonus: +15

skillTree.localised_description: These lands now belong to the Great Sultan. Put those worms to good use and see to it that his empire prospers!

effects.description:
Growth: +15
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Mehmed earned his sobriquet after the Battle of Nine Jackals, in which he slaughtered a force of Bretonnian crusaders. He left only one man alive to bear the tale to his countrymen, but only after he had chopped off his hands.

effects.description: Ability: "Massacre Them!"

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
